fields.name: templateOverride
fields.label: Template Override
fields.description: Apply a specific template. This will override the template from metadata spreadsheet

fields.name: disableBreadcrumbs
fields.label: Disable Breadcrumbs
fields.description: If toggled on, breadcrumbs will not be displayed on the page. By default, breadcrumbs are displayed if the page's path is more than 2 levels deep.
